message.body: Will.. On a sad note, if u hadn't heard, the 2 little girls that were supposedly killed by their care-giver. This all happend on our street in the apartment bui
Yeah I know, I heard the story and recognized the building. So tragic
Thank you! The weather here is cold and slightly rainy, just like you said it was when I was born. Have you been bracing yourself for the hurricane ("frankenstorm")?
